chapter.title: Bugs
chapter.para: This chapter tries to reference bugs in the Ardour Bug Tracker and group and prioritize them according my taste.

It will also contain notes on bugs I encounter so I can investigate them further before putting them in the bug tracker. If a bug is on a private branch then the notes will only remain until it is fixed.

section.title: Mantis Bugs
section.para: These are bugs reported by other users in the bug tracker that I think are important.

section.title: General Bugs
section.para: These bugs are general bugs in no catagory.

Cannot Audition while playing back session
